description: Try our easy to follow Toasted Hot Cross Bun Cheese Board Crackers recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Toasted Hot Cross Bun Cheese Board Crackers Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 leftover brioche (or traditional hot cross buns)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 170Â°C. Use a sharp knife to slice hot cross buns as thin as possible.
Lay out on two baking trays and brush lightly with olive oil, sprinkle with a little salt and bake for 10 minutes or until golden and crunchy.
Serve with a selection of cheeses and fresh fruit, such as figs and grapes, in place of regular crackers.
